document_data.mainbody:
Newf was a human pirate from the isle of Brynnlaw in the Sea of Swords in the late 14 century DR.
Newf was a simple-looking man with brown hair and dressed red-hued commoners garb.
In the , Newf could be found drinking in the Vulgar Monkey dock-side tavern. Like so many fellow pirate customers of the rowdy establishment, Newf was an eager sea-shanty singer. Ise th by that Builds the Boat was his favorite.
